abstract: Telecommunication companies in the U.S. have to juggle the financial effect of customers dropping their landlines, and increased competition between wireless operators.
snippet: Telecommunication companies in the U.S. have to juggle the financial effect of customers dropping their landlines, and increased competition between wireless operators.
lead_paragraph: With millions of people snapping up the iPhone, AT&T, the exclusive carrier for the popular phone, should be quite pleased with the stream of revenue it can expect from customers.

headline.main: Phone Giants Fight to Keep Subscribers
headline.print_headline: Phone Giants Fight to Keep Subscribers
